title: Tether challenges UN claims of USDT use in illegal activities, advocates for blockchain education
description:
Stablecoin issuer Tether criticized the United Nations report, claiming that its USDT tokens are being used for illegal activities. In a Jan. 16 blog post, Tether said the monitoring its stablecoins attract from regulatory authority surpasses those of the traditional banking systems. The firm furthered that its assets were extensively monitored by global regulatory agencies, […]

The post Tether challenges UN claims of USDT use in illegal activities, advocates for blockchain education appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: OKX secures conditional license from Dubai regulator
description: OKX commended VARA's efficient licensing process and effectiveness in governing the crypto sector responsibly.

title: These Altcoins Can Outshine Bitcoin In 2024
description: Dive into the latest trends in the cryptocurrency market with insightful analyses of Solana's surging DEX activity, Ripple's legal milestones, and VeChain's U.S. patent triumph. Explore potential price movements, key support and resistance levels, and the delicate balance between optimism and caution in this comprehensive overview. Stay informed on the dynamic landscape of Solana, Ripple, and VeChain, and make informed decisions in the ever-evolving world of digital assets.

title: Attempted Bitfinex Exploit for $15 Billion XRP Fails
description: Bitfinex’s security protocols came into the spotlight when a seemingly massive XRP transfer, initially causing alarm among crypto watchers, turned out to be a foiled exploit attempt. $15 Billion of XRP Transfer Attempt Fizzles Out A failed exploit attempt on cryptocurrency exchange Bitfinex was brought to light, involving nearly $15 billion worth of XRP tokens, […]

title: Cardano unveils new ‘Explorer’ for transparency, Everlodge deepens market presence
description: Cardano further enhances transparency with new explorer. Everlodge deepens market presence

title: Fantom Reduces Staking Requirements for Validators
description:
The Fantom Foundation revealed in a new X post that it has reduced the validator self-staking requirement on its layer-1 blockchain by 90%. The foundation noted that it made the changes following the recent vote and as part of a broader plan to improve security. Let’s discover more about it. Fantom Lowers Staking Criteria for […]

The post Fantom Reduces Staking Requirements for Validators appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: Bitcoin Halving Model Predicts Accumulation; Whale Activity Spikes with Stablecoin Shift
description:
The best thing about the current Bitcoin market cycle model is that only a few will believe it when it detects a phase transition, according to a crypto analyst posting as PlanB on X. He recalled an earlier post from January 12, when he posted that the bear market was over, but many users thought […]

The post Bitcoin Halving Model Predicts Accumulation; Whale Activity Spikes with Stablecoin Shift appeared first on Coin Edition.
